search_result.Title: Perdue Chicken | PERDUE®
search_result.Description: The Perdue name means the best quality, nutrition, and safety. Perdue chicken is 100% veggie fed with no animal-by-products. Taste the difference.
search_result.Concated_text:
Title:Perdue Chicken | PERDUE®
Link:http://www.perdue.com/
Description:The Perdue name means the best quality, nutrition, and safety. Perdue chicken is 100% veggie fed with no animal-by-products. Taste the difference.
search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "The homepage of Perdue's website provides a comprehensive overview of the company and its products. Five brief summaries accurately highlight the following content:

1. The company's commitment to providing chicken that is 100% veggie-fed, with no animal-by-products, and a brief mention of the taste and quality.
2. An invitation to explore the brand's new line of rotisserie-seasoned chicken, along with a link to the product page.
3. A concise statement that Perdue chicken is not antibiotic ever.
4. Information on the company's dedication to animal care, including providing the chickens with enough space to move around, access to fresh air and sunlight, and a nutritious diet.
5. A description of the company's three main product lines: Perdue, Perdue Chicken Plus, and Perdue Fresh Cuts, each with a brief explanation of the unique features of each product line.",
 "Company Name": "Perdue",
 "Email": "None",
 "Phone Number": "1-800-4PERDUE (1-800-473-7383)",
 "Address": "None",
 "Product Information": "• **Perdue:** No antibiotics ever, 100% veggie-fed, no animal-by-products. 

• **Perdue Chicken Plus:** Chicken with veggie nutrition.

• **Perdue Fresh Cuts:** Pre-cut, pan-ready chicken.",
 "Representative": "None",
 "Useful Information": "• Perdue is committed to animal care, providing chickens with enough space to move around, access to fresh air and sunlight, and a nutritious diet.

• The website has a variety of resources, including recipes, cooking tips, and information on the company's products and practices."
}

The company is committed to animal welfare and has a variety of sustainability initiatives.",

* Refrigerated breaded chicken
* Air fryer chicken
* Chicken plus
* Organic chicken

Perdue chicken is 100% veggie fed with no animal-by-products. Their products are never imported and they have a never-antibiotics policy. Their chickens are raised without hormones or growth promotants.",
 "Representative": null,
 "Useful Information": "* Perdue chicken is 100% veggie fed with no animal-by-products.
* Perdue products are never imported and they have a never-antibiotics policy.
* Perdue chickens are raised without hormones or growth promotants.
* Perdue offers a variety of chicken products, including refrigerated breaded chicken, air fryer chicken, chicken plus, and organic chicken.

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "This website is about recipes that are nutritious, creative and delicious. It provides easy chicken recipes that are guaranteed to make you and your family smile. There is a search bar available to search for specific recipes and the website is providing options such as soup, salad, gluten-free, one-pot meals, dinner, lunch, and more. There are also different filters to filter by different categories, such as preparation, lifestyle, course, cuisine, dietary, cook time, and product type. 

There is a hero image at the top of the page with some copy and buttons for the search bar and a button to open a menu. After the hero image, there are filters to search by feature and product type. 

Below the filters, there is a carousel of 3 recipes with 3 different products. Under the carousel, there is a callout for How To: Sauteing.",

{
 "Summary": "PERDUE® offers a variety of chicken products. They includes gluten-free options, organic chicken, fun picks for kids, traditional whole birds, ground chicken and turkey, and more. 

Their main products are: 

- PERDUE® FRESH BONELESS SKINLESS CHICKEN BREASTS

- PERDUE® SHORT CUTS® GRILLED CHICKEN STRIPS 

- PERDUE® PERFECT PORTIONS® BONELESS SKINLESS CHICKEN BREAST ALL NATURAL

Customers can also find where to buy PERDUE® products, promotions, and recipes for inspiration. 

PERDUE® is committed to quality and has a number of certifications, including: 

- No Antibiotics Ever

- Organic

- Never-Imported

- Animal Care

- Veggie-Fed

- Free-Range",

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "Perd due is a family-owned company that has been producing poultry and other food products for over 100 years, and is committed to providing high-quality, affordable food to families. We offer a wide variety of fresh and frozen poultry products, as well as a line of prepared foods and snacks. We are also committed to giving back to the communities we serve. search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "Perdue's pasture-raised poultry is a different animal, raised on pasture in a natural habitat. Perdue is the first company in the world to have a USDA process-verified program that guarantees every bird was truly raised on fresh pasture. Their commitment to pasture-raised poultry goes beyond the grass where their chickens graze. Our chickens are free to roam and forage, and are never given drugs or antibiotics, allowing their natural immune system to develop.",

This includes things like providing a clean environment, using probiotics and vaccines, and avoiding the use of antibiotics as a way to cover up poor housing conditions.",
 "Company Name": "Perdue",

Try making your own sauce at home.\n- Inspired by everyone’s favorite Thanksgiving vegetable, PERDUE® THANKSNUGGETS® pair the No Antibiotics Ever Turkey you love, with sweet potato-flavored breading. It’s all the flavors of Thanksgiving packed into one perfect bite.",
